projects.title: 1972 Yamaha CS3 Carburetor Removal Manual
projects.description: I wrote this instruction manual for Saints Engine & Machine, a mechanic shop that specializes in vintage motorcycle restoration (one of my hobbies). The manual guides the user through basic carburetor removal in preparation for cleaning.

projects.title: Getting Started with Phishing Simulation
projects.description: I created the Online Help, including this Getting Started guide, for Trend Vision One's new Phishing Simulation feature. I regularly contribute to the Vision One Online Help for various apps and features. Our documentation toolchain consists of DITA XML, Oxygen, Git/GitHub, and an internal CMS.

projects.title: With generational change, Taiwanâ€™s King Steel transforms into an innovation and sustainability leader
projects.description: I edited this Microsoft case study on King Steel, a Taiwanese machinery manufacturing company that's helping driving sustainability in the shoe manufacturing industry with their injection molding technology. I've also written web copy for King Steel's English website.

projects.title: What You Need to Know About E-bike Battery Safety
projects.description: I wrote this informational article on e-bike battery safety for Tern, a bicycle manufacturing company. I've written multiple articles for Tern and am proud to collaborate with an eco-conscious company truly invested in sustainable transportation.
